 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲמֹרָה‎</span><sub>19</sub> **proper name, of a location** ==Gomorrah==, <span class="bdbLangGreek">Γομορρα</span> (<span class="bdbLangGreek">Γ</span> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; √ II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עמר‎</span> according to [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 54</sup>); — always with  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְדֹם‎</span> q. v.; [[Gen.10.19|Gen 10:19]] + 8 t. Genesis; in simile [[Amos.4.11|Amos 4:11]]; [[Isa.1.9|Isa 1:9]]; [[Isa.13.19|Isa 13:19]]; [[Deut.29.22|Deut 29:22]]; [[Jer.49.18|Jer 49:18]]; [[Jer.50.40|Jer 50:40]]; [[Zeph.2.9|Zeph 2:9]], compare [[Deut.32.32|Deut 32:32]] figurative of iniquity [[Isa.1.10|Isa 1:10]]; [[Jer.23.14|Jer 23:14]].
